changes.title: Miner
changes.description: New characters for the upcoming new stages.

changes.title: New Special Upgrade
changes.description: We added 30+ new special upgrades, and also adjusted old special upgrades.

changes.title: New Weapon Evo System
changes.description: we added a new system where each character's weapon can evolve and make the character stronger with new abilities.

changes.title: New Rarity and Legendary Chest
changes.description: There is now a new upgrade with a mythic level, and it is only obtained from the legendary chest with a small chance of miniboss and boss.

changes.title: Update Notes Menu
changes.description: You can now view our game changes and updates from this menu, and will be notified when a new version is available.

changes.title: Shop Refund System
changes.description: You can now refund the gold you have spent on the shop.

changes.title: Leaderboard Error
changes.description:
We've fixed an error posting highscore data to the leaderboard that caused the abilities from the previous game that were retrieved to be listed when you pressed play again.
And we've also fixed the leaderboard reload button, which becomes disabled when you return to the main menu after playing.

changes.title: Saving Data
changes.description: We have improved the game's saving system, which should prevent certain data from being deleted when players upgrade the game to a new version.

changes.title: Leaderboard
changes.description:
In this version, we try to implement a Leaderboard system.
With the leaderboard, everyone can look at what the others are building to achieve a high score.

changes.title: Nickname System
changes.description:
The nickname is used for the highscore leaderboard.
Maybe in the future it will be based on the username from Steam.

changes.title: Protobarrier Bug
changes.description: Fixed the issue of the knight's abilities not being able to turn on again when taking unique abilities that reduce max hp capacity.
